entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Cobourg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:56 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cobourg 2:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Temperature: 1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: 0.1°C
Wind: NW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. High plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
